function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines during the delivery of goods and basic needs","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases, such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of social distancing protocols, use of contactless delivery methods","Technologies":"Drone technology for contactless delivery, communication systems for remote coordination","People":"Public, suppliers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Local authorities, logistics companies"},{"Description":"Transportation of biological samples by drones","Impact":"Potential risk of sample contamination or mishandling during transportation","Mitigation":"Developing secure and safe packaging for biological samples, implementing strict handling procedures","Technologies":"Secure packaging technology for biological samples, monitoring and tracking systems for sample transportation","People":"Healthcare workers, laboratory technicians","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, drone operators"},{"Description":"Delivery of medical supplies to austere territories using drones","Impact":"Dependency on drones for critical healthcare delivery, as well as potential safety issues in remote areas","Mitigation":"Developing backup delivery methods, ensuring drone safety and reliability in extreme conditions","Technologies":"Backup delivery methods for remote areas, drone safety and reliability technology","People":"Residents of austere territories, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, drone operators"}]}
